Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Prehistoric Statuette
Description: This prehistoric pottery statuette is a grotesque representation of a naked woman. It is noticeable that the face is very small compared to the rest of the body because the artist concentrated on showing the sexual parts of the body. This kind of statuette played the part of concubines for the deceased in his tomb
